copyright: Your Watch Shop. All rights reserved.
aboutDescription: We specialize in selling high-quality luxury watches. Therefore, we strive to offer our customers only the best watches. Working with us means experiencing perfection.
missionDescription: Our goal is to provide our customers with exceptional watches and quality service. Every watch is a representation of perfection to us.
event2: Started collaboration with the first major customer.
event3: Achieved success in the international market.
contactDescription: If you have any questions about our watches and services, don’t hesitate to reach out to us. Contact our customer service for the best solutions.
additionalInfoDescription: If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.
visitUs: Come to our luxury watch store and explore our premium watches up close. Contact us!
rolexBrandHistory: Founded in 1905, Rolex is the pinnacle of luxury watchmaking. Hans Wilsdorf’s vision of creating watches that combine precision and elegance revolutionized the watch industry for centuries. Every Rolex watch represents a harmonious blend of innovation and tradition.
rolexFact1: Rolex invented the first waterproof wristwatch, the 'Oyster', in 1926, revolutionizing the watch industry.
rolexFact2: It takes about one year to produce each Rolex watch, with more than 200 individual components being meticulously assembled.
rolexFact3: Rolex watches have been worn on many historical expeditions, from the summit of Mount Everest to the deepest point in the Mariana Trench.
storeDescription: Since 2005, our boutique has represented the Rolex legacy with unwavering standards. As an official Rolex dealer, we present extraordinary works of time, reflecting the prestige and heritage of the brand in an exceptional atmosphere.
storeFact1: Our staff undergoes extensive training directly from Rolex to provide expert knowledge on every collection and model.
storeFact2: Our store features a special service center operated by Rolex-certified watchmakers.
storeFact3: We hold exclusive events throughout the year, offering our customers early access to limited releases and special collections before they go on general sale.
craftsmanshipDescription: Each Rolex watch is the pinnacle of Swiss watchmaking. Carefully and precisely created, these watches combine time-honored craftsmanship with modern technology, honed over generations.
craftFact1: Every Rolex movement is assembled by hand and tested in five positions to ensure accuracy in various conditions, exceeding official chronometer certification standards.
craftFact2: Rolex retains its own gold smelting facility, allowing it to fully control the production of 18-carat gold alloys, including the Everose gold, which never fades.
craftFact3: Iconic Rolex decoration starts with a piece of gold or platinum, which is worked for up to 6 hours with precision to achieve its unique pattern.

datejustDescription: A classic model with timeless design and daily practicality.

submarinerDescription: The Rolex Submariner is a line of sports watches designed for diving and known for their resistance to water and corrosion.
dayDateDescription: The Rolex Day-Date is Rolex's most prestigious model, worn by more presidents, leaders and visionaries than any other watch.
gmtDescription: The Rolex GMT-Master II is designed to display the time in two different time zones simultaneously during intercontinental flights.

login.hero_subtitle1: The perfect blend of luxury and precision
login.no_results_message: Please adjust your search and filter parameters.
login.error_message: Error loading products. Please try again later.
login.question1Title: How do I place an order?
login.question1Content: To place an order, simply browse our products, select the items you want, add them to your cart, and proceed to checkout. Follow the steps to provide shipping and payment information, then confirm your order.
login.question2Title: What payment methods do you accept?
login.question2Content: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Google Pay, and Apple Pay. We also offer bank transfer options for large orders.
login.question3Title: How can I track my order?
login.question3Content: Once your order is shipped, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also check your order status by logging into your account and viewing your order history.
login.question4Content: We offer a 30-day return policy for most products. Items must be in their original condition with all packaging. Please contact customer service to initiate a return. Custom orders are non-returnable.
login.question5Content: Shipping times vary depending on your location. Domestic orders typically arrive within 3-5 business days, while international orders may take 7-14 business days. Express shipping options are available during checkout.
login.question6Content: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping costs and times vary by location. Any import duties or taxes are the responsibility of the customer.
login.question7Content: Absolutely. We only sell 100% authentic products sourced directly from manufacturers or authorized distributors. We stand behind the authenticity of every item we sell.
login.question8Title: How do I contact customer service?
login.question8Content: You can reach our customer service team by email at support@example.com, by phone at +1-800-123-4567, or through the live chat on our website. Our support hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EST.
login.question9Content: Yes, we offer gift wrapping services for an additional fee. You can select this option during checkout and even include a personalized message for the recipient.
login.question10Title: What if my order arrives damaged?
login.question10Content: If your order arrives damaged, please contact us within 48 hours. Take photos of the damaged items and packaging, and our team will assist you with a replacement or refund.
login.question11Title: Do you have a loyalty program?
login.question11Content: Yes, we have a rewards program where you earn points for every purchase. These points can be redeemed for discounts on future orders. You can sign up for the program during checkout or in your account settings.
login.question12Content: Orders can be canceled if they haven't been processed yet. Please contact customer service immediately if you wish to cancel. Once an order has been shipped, it cannot be canceled, but you can return it according to our return policy.
login.question13Title: Do you offer warranties on your products?
login.question13Content: Most of our products come with a manufacturer's warranty. The duration and coverage vary by brand and product. Warranty information is included in the product description and packaging.
login.question14Title: How can I change my account information?
login.question14Content: You can update your account information by logging into your account and going to the 'Account Settings' page. From there, you can modify your personal details, address, and payment methods.
login.question15Content: Yes, we offer discounts for bulk orders. Please contact our sales team at sales@example.com with details about the products and quantities you're interested in, and we'll provide you with a custom quote.
login.didntFindAnswer: Didn't find the answer you were looking for? Submit your question below and our team will get back to you via email as soon as possible.
login.typeYourQuestion: Type your question here and we'll respond to your email...
login.questionSubmittedSuccess: Your question has been submitted successfully!
login.willRespondSoon: We'll respond to your email as soon as possible.

customer1Feedback: The quality and variety of watches were truly excellent. The staff was very professional and friendly. Shopping here was a very pleasant experience for me.
customer2Feedback: The gold bracelet I bought from this store is both high quality and beautifully designed. The store management and employees are very sincere and helpful.
customer3Feedback: The quality and design of the watches are excellent. The service is also very good. I recommend it to all my friends.
customer4Feedback: Very professional team and quality products. The selection of jewelry is also very wide and diverse.

notifyMeDescription: We will send you a notification via email when this product becomes available again.
notificationSuccess: You will be notified when the product becomes available.
question1Content: Our return policy allows returns within 30 days of purchase.
question2Title: How can I track my order?
question2Content: You can track your order using the tracking number provided in your confirmation email.
question3Content: Yes, we offer international shipping to most countries.
question4Title: What payment methods do you accept?
question4Content: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.
question5Title: Is my data secure on your website?
question5Content: Yes, we use SSL encryption to ensure your data is secure.
question6Title: How do I change my password?
question6Content: You can change your password by visiting your account settings and clicking 'Change Password'.
question7Title: How can I contact customer support?
question7Content: You can reach our customer support team by emailing support@example.com.
question8Content: Yes, we offer gift cards that can be purchased on our website.
question9Title: How do I apply a discount code?
question9Content: You can apply your discount code at checkout in the designated field.
question10Title: Can I modify my order after placing it?
question10Content: Once an order is placed, it cannot be modified. Please contact us as soon as possible if you need assistance.
question11Title: What should I do if I received a damaged product?
question11Content: Please contact customer support immediately, and we will assist you with a replacement or refund.
question12Title: How can I update my account information?
question12Content: You can update your account information by visiting your profile page and clicking 'Edit Profile'.
question13Content: Our business hours are Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM.
question14Title: How do I cancel my order?
question14Content: To cancel your order, please contact customer support immediately. Orders cannot be canceled once shipped.
question15Title: Can I make a special request for my order?
question15Content: If you have a special request, please include it in the order notes during checkout, and we will do our best to accommodate it.
